name: Aetherblade Shenanigans
description: Cantha's no stranger to the occasional troublemaker, but sky pirates from the Mists are new.
requirement: Successfully complete events involving the Aetherblades in Seitung Province.

bits.text: Repel the Aetherblade assault in Daigo Ward.
Escort Officer Roz near the monastery.
Defeat the Aetherblade champion near the monastery.
Defeat the Aetherblade leader in Haiju Plains.
Repel the Aetherblade assault in Emerald Park.
Repel the Aetherblade assault in Jaya Bluffs.
